title: Aaron Neville
itunes:title: Aaron Neville
description: In the wake of Aaron Neville’s surprise return to the pop charts with Linda Ronstadt, the soul legend graced the SNAP studio in 1990 with a transcendent solo set for voice and piano.
itunes:summary: In the wake of Aaron Neville’s surprise return to the pop charts with Linda Ronstadt, the soul legend graced the SNAP studio in 1990 with a transcendent solo set for voice and piano.
media:description: Soul legend Aaron Neville graced the SNAP studio for a transcendent solo set in the wake of his surprise return to the pop charts.
author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW, Tricia Halloran)
itunes:author: KCRW, Tricia Halloran
content:encoded: In the wake of Aaron Neville’s surprise return to the pop charts with Linda Ronstadt, the soul legend graced the SNAP studio in 1990 with a transcendent solo set for voice and piano.
